content: We are looking for a real hustler who can bring us 1000 actual paying customers. We will pay $10 000 for this in cryptocurrency (BTC, USDT, or XMR). We developed a legitimate cryptocurrency project (no ICO, no nft, no ponzi, no mlm ). We can only reveal details about our product in private messages; not here in the public. Our crypto project includes P2P trades, private payments, and goods and services in exchange for crypto. We pay in stages, which is how we proceed. If you bring us 50 actual paying customers to us, we will pay you $500. If you bring us 100 actual paying customers to us,, we'll pay you $1000. If you bring us 200 actual paying customers to us,, we'll give you $2000. If you bring us 300 actual paying customers to us, we will pay you $3000. ...If you bring us us 1000 actual paying customers, we will pay you $10000. We'll check to see if the users you bring are genuine. We will alert you if we believe they are false. We will end the contract if you keep bringing phony users.We won't make an advance payment. Upon reaching 50 users, we will begin to pay. If both parties are on board with the deal, we'll provide weekly or daily traffic statistics.Get in touch with me for more information.
